official_title: A resolution to authorize Jay Constantine, an employee of the Committee on Finance, to appear as a witness in the case of Texas Medical Association against Caspar W. Weinberger.

summary.text: Authorizes Jay Constantine, an employee of the Committee on Finance, to appear as a witness in the case of Texas Medical Association against Caspar W. Weinberger.
